patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,1 +1,2 @@
-@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:ital,wght@0,100;0,200;0,300;0,400;0,500;0,600;0,700;0,800;0,900;1,100;1,200;1,300;1,400;1,500;1,600;1,700;1,800;1,900&display=swap"); * { box-sizing: border-box; font-family: "Poppins", sans-serif; } :root { --sidebar-color: #312450; --primary-color: #5e42a6; --secondary-color: #b74e91; --section-bg-color: #c7b2dc; --dark-color: #000000; --navbar-bg-color: #273053; --p-color: #717275; --highlight-icon-color: #ff0100; --main-transition: 0.5s all ease-in-out; } html,body { height: 100%; margin: 0; padding: 0; } .flex-section{ display: flex; flex-direction: row; } /*side bar*/ .flex-section .menu { min-height: 100vh; /* ensures sidebar spans at least the full screen */ height: auto; /* lets it grow with content */ width: 300px; top: 0; left: 0; position: sticky; background-color: var(--sidebar-color); padding: 145px 30px; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } .flex-section .menu ul { list-style: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; text-align: right; } .flex-section .menu ul li { margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 20px; position: relative; /* needed for ::after positioning */ padding-bottom: 10px; } .flex-section .menu ul li a { text-decoration: none; color: #8b82a1; } .flex-section .menu ul li::after { content: ""; position: absolute; left: 0; bottom: 0; width: 100%; /* stick to the bottom */ height: 2px; background-color: #8b82a1; /* thickness of underline */ transition: width 0.3s ease; } /*use js*/ .flex-section .menu ul li a:hover::after { width: 100%; /* expand underline on hover */ } .flex-section .menu ul li a:hover { color:#b5b8bf; } .flex-section .menu ul li a:active { color:#5e42a6; } .flex-section .menu ul li a:active::after { background: linear-gradient(to right, #4b0082, #8b00ff, #981196); } /*content first section */ .flex-section .section { flex: 1; background-color: var(--section-bg-color); background-attachment: fixed; background-image: url("../assets/css/images/Screenshot\ 2025-09-15\ 075920.png"); background-position: top right; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 100% 100%; } .flex-section .section .content { display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 100%; } .flex-section .section .content .intro { padding: 100px; width: 100%; height: 100vh; } .flex-section .section .content .intro h1 { color: rgb(221, 213, 213); font-size: 50px; } .flex-section .section .content .intro p, .flex-section .section .content .intro a { color: var(--section-bg-color); font-size: 20px; } .flex-section .section .content .intro a:hover { color: #fefefe; text-decoration: none; } .flex-section .section .content .intro button { color: var(--section-bg-color); background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid var(--section-bg-color); padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 25px; cursor: pointer; text-decoration: none; font-size: 18px; } .flex-section .section .content .intro button:hover { background-color:#6f54b6; } /*content second section */
\ No newline at end of file
+@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:ital,wght@0,100;0,200;0,300;0,400;0,500;0,600;0,700;0,800;0,900;1,100;1,200;1,300;1,400;1,500;1,600;1,700;1,800;1,900&display=swap"); * { box-sizing: border-box; font-family: "Poppins", sans-serif; } :root { --sidebar-color: #312450; --primary-color: #5e42a6; --secondary-color: #b74e91; --section-bg-color: #c7b2dc; --dark-color: #000000; --navbar-bg-color: #273053; --p-color: #717275; --highlight-icon-color: #ff0100; --main-transition: 0.5s all ease-in-out; } html,body { height: 100%; margin: 0; padding: 0; } .flex-section{ display: flex; flex-direction: row; } /*side bar*/ .flex-section .menu { min-height: 100vh; /* ensures sidebar spans at least the full screen */ height: auto; /* lets it grow with content */ width: 300px; top: 0; left: 0; position: sticky; background-color: var(--sidebar-color); padding: 145px 30px; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } .flex-section .menu ul { list-style: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; text-align: right; } .flex-section .menu ul li { margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 20px; position: relative; /* needed for ::after positioning */ padding-bottom: 10px; } .flex-section .menu ul li a { text-decoration: none; color: #8b82a1; } .flex-section .menu ul li::after { content: ""; position: absolute; left: 0; bottom: 0; width: 100%; /* stick to the bottom */ height: 2px; background-color: #8b82a1; /* thickness of underline */ transition: width 0.3s ease; } /*use js*/ .flex-section .menu ul li a:hover::after { width: 100%; /* expand underline on hover */ } .flex-section .menu ul li a:hover { color:#b5b8bf; } .flex-section .menu ul li a:active { color:#5e42a6; } .flex-section .menu ul li a:active::after { background: linear-gradient(to right, #4b0082, #8b00ff, #981196); } /*content first section */ .flex-section .section { flex: 1; background-color: var(--section-bg-color); background-attachment: fixed; background-image: url("../assets/css/images/Screenshot\ 2025-09-15\ 075920.png"); background-position: top right; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 100% 100%; } .flex-section .section .content { display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 100%; } .flex-section .section .content .intro { padding: 100px; width: 100%; height: 100vh; } .flex-section .section .content .intro h1 { color: rgb(221, 213, 213); font-size: 50px; } .flex-section .section .content .intro p, .flex-section .section .content .intro a { color: var(--section-bg-color); font-size: 20px; } .flex-section .section .content .intro a:hover { color: #fefefe; text-decoration: none; } .flex-section .section .content .intro button { color: var(--section-bg-color); background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid var(--section-bg-color); padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 25px; cursor: pointer; text-decoration: none; font-size: 18px; } .flex-section .section .content .intro button:hover { background-color:#6f54b6; } /*content second section */

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:ital,wght@0,100;0,200;0,300;0,400;0,500;0,600;0,700;0,800;0,900;1,100;1,200;1,300;1,400;1,500;1,600;1,700;1,800;1,900&display=swap"); color: #8b82a1; } .flex-section .menu ul li::after { content: ""; position: absolute; left: 0; bottom: 0; width: 100%; /* stick to the bottom */ height: 2px; background-color: #8b82a1; /* thickness of underline */ transition: width 0.3s ease; background-attachment: fixed; background-image: url("../assets/css/images/Screenshot\ 2025-09-15\ 075920.png"); background-position: top right; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 100% 100%;
